entry.title: lawalstacks/RustyTodo: RustyTodo is a high-performance, lightweight todo management application built with Rust for the backend and Nextjs for the frontend. It offers seamless task management with features like adding, editing, searching, and deleting todos, all powered by the robustness and speed of Rust.
entry.content: RustyTodo is a high-performance, lightweight todo management application built with Rust for the backend and Nextjs for the frontend. It offers seamless task management with features like adding, editing, searching, and deleting todos, all powered by the robustness and speed of Rust.

entry.title: DeveloperWilliams/mini-daraja: Mini-Daraja is a lightweight Node.js library for seamless integration with the Safaricom Daraja API. It simplifies handling M-Pesa operations like STK Push, B2C, C2B, transaction status, and balance inquiries, with modern ES6 module support and robust error handling
entry.content: Mini-Daraja is a lightweight Node.js library for seamless integration with the Safaricom Daraja API. It simplifies handling M-Pesa operations like STK Push, B2C, C2B, transaction status, and balance inquiries, with modern ES6 module support and robust error handling
